lead_paragraph: Borders, a former Atlanta City Council president who calls herself a “raving fan” of the Atlanta Dream, takes over a league that is struggling with attendance.

headline.print_headline: Needing Boost, W.N.B.A. Hires a Leader Who Follows the Game
headline.main: By Hiring Lisa M. Borders, W.N.B.A. Gets a Leader Who Follows the Game

snippet: Borders, a former Atlanta City Council president who calls herself a “raving fan” of the Atlanta Dream, takes over a league that is struggling with attendance.
abstract: Lisa M Borders is named WNBA president, as league enters 20th season; organization faces declining attendance and criticism for handling of domestic violence and sexual harassment issues, but Borders expresses optimism about future of league that is rife with talent.
